about_the_game:
At it's very core, Fishing Mega-Game is all about collecting fish. Each fish has a different arrangement of starting upgrades and attacks. The more fish you encounter the more you can experience. Who knows, you might get lucky and find an oddly colored "shiny" fish!

While fishing, send your bait into a fishing hole full of hungry fish looking to weaken you until you are fully consumed. Combat this with an arsenal resembling an aquatic "bullet heaven" type of game. Level up, or find rare upgrades to power through the hordes of small fry before you arrive at the main catch. Deal enough damage to it and add it to your collection!

This game takes inspiration from Vampire Survivors and Ridiculous Fishing!

Key Features

  • Creature Collecting

  • Roguelike style leveling

  • Meta-progression

  • and more!
